Entity.name: tab_5
Entity.Entity: <VariableStorageComponent _enabled="1" name="serialized_tooltip" value_bool="0" value_float="0" value_int="0" value_string="EMERALD TABLET OF THOTH (Vanilla) The necessity of concealing the Art isone of the chief anxieties of alchemists. We are sworn to secrecy by heaven and earth and hellby the four elements by the height and the depthby Hermes by Anubisand by the howlings of Kerkoros.An oath has been required of us to revealnothing clearly to any uninitiated being." >
